channel.title: Servers on Techtaste
channel.description: Recent content in Servers on Techtaste

item.title: Web Server vs App Server
item.description: Web Server vs Applicatoin Server Web Server is designed to serve HTTP Content. App Server can also serve HTTP Content but is not limited to just HTTP. It can be provided other protocol support such as RMI/RPC Web Server Servers only web pages. Could be static or Dynamic pages Static Pages HTML CSS JavaScript(Interactively) Dynamic Pages JSP, Servlet (JAVA + HTML + CSS + JavaScript) PHP (PHP + HTML + CSS + JavaScript) ASP.
